sn14.4:1.2: “Mendicants, diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of contacts, and diversity of contacts gives rise to diversity of feelings.
sn14.4:1.3: And what is the diversity of elements?
sn14.4:1.4: The eye element, ear element, nose element, tongue element, body element, and mind element.
sn14.4:1.5: This is called the diversity of elements.
sn14.4:2.1: And how does diversity of elements give rise to diversity of contacts, and diversity of contacts gives rise to diversity of feelings?
sn14.4:2.2: The eye element gives rise to eye contact. Eye contact gives rise to the feeling born of eye contact. …
sn14.4:2.3: The mind element gives rise to mind contact. Mind contact gives rise to the feeling born of mind contact.
sn14.4:2.4: That’s how diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of contacts, and diversity of contacts gives rise to diversity of feelings.”
